src:
3 Masalah Besar yang Harus Diselesaikan Barcelona, Ernesto Valverde Sanggup?
07 Nov 2019, 15:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Musim mulai memasuki tahap penting, Barcelona masih berjalan di tempat. Performa tim asuhan Ernesto Valverde belum benar-benar mencapai level yang diharapkan dan hasil-hasil pertandingan tidak bisa menutupi masalah tim.
Permainan Barca aneh, tidak terpola. Mereka hanya bisa memberikan bola pada Lionel Messi dan berharap dia melakukan keajaiban. Lagi-lagi Messi.
Sayangnya, Messi tidak bisa melakukan semuanya seorang diri. Jika benar ingin mewujudkan mimpi menjuarai Liga Champions, Barcelona butuh lebih dari sekadar Messi level top.
Valverde harus segera menemukan solusi sebelum segalanya jadi lebih buruk. Saat ini, Sport mengklaim Valverde punya tiga masalah utama yang harus diselesaikan.

Apa saja? Scroll ke bawah ya, Bolaneters!
text:
3 Big Problems that Barcelona Have to Resolve, Ernesto Valverde Can?
Nov 7 2019, 15:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Season is entering an important stage, Barcelona is still running in place. Ernesto Valverde's team's performance has not really reached the level expected and the match results cannot cover the team's problems.
Barca's game is weird, not patterned. They can only give the ball to Lionel Messi and hope he does a miracle. Messi again.
Unfortunately, Messi cannot do everything alone. If you really want to realize the dream of winning the Champions League, Barcelona need more than just top level Messi.
Valverde must immediately find a solution before things get worse. Currently, Sport claims Valverde has three main problems that must be resolved.

Anything? Scroll down, Bolaneters!
